name: Trag
title: usetrag.com
payoff: AI Code Review for Effortless Development
shortDescription: Trag is an AI-driven code review tool designed to streamline the development process for software engineers. It automatically scans pull requests, identifies issues, and suggests fixes, supporting all programming languages. Ideal for development teams seeking to enhance code quality and speed up review times, Trag can be integrated directly into the development workflow, making it a valuable tool for both small startups and large enterprises.
cons: May not catch all subtle bugs
Depends on integration with repo systems
Potential for false positives in feedback

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: CodeClimate
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focus on maintainability and test coverage
